description.originalText: After speaking with Marilyn we scheduled a time to meet and she was a no show, no call. My brother and I were truly disappointed and found it to be unprofessional. I will never reach out to her again for help and would not suggest you do either. Care giving is an very important aspect for families who need service and a caregiver should never leave a family without service or notice.

If I could give ZERO stars to this woman, I would! My family and I had 3 interviews with Marilyn and she confirmed that she would accept the position and agreed to the start date. We then paused our hiring efforts and turned down other wonderful candidates because Marilyn confirmed that she would be starting with my family.  We NEVER heard back from her! We sent emails and texts for 3 days and she never responded to one message. How foolish that for the first 2 days of not hearing back, we were actually worried that something happened to her because she sounded so  wonderful during the interviews. By the 3rd day we saw her true side and gave up reaching out to her. 

Please take this into consideration when you think about hiring this woman. How kind and compassionate will she really be when caring for your loved one?

And yes, she did provide me with 4 references, and interestingly enough, only 1 of them called me back. It was a good reference -- but from many years ago. Clearly Marilyn's priorities have changed since then. A simple text or phone call to let us know that she changed her mind would've been greatly appreciated. But she didn't even have enough consideration to do that. 

This shows the true charachter of this woman, so please use this as a warning when thinking about hiring her to take care of your loved one.

description.displayText: Marilyn was a godsend to our family.  She went above and beyond to look after my elderly relative with compassion, cheerfulness, and expertise.  She has tremendous knowledge and experience.  We were blessed and thankful to find her.
description.originalText: Marilyn was a godsend to our family.  She went above and beyond to look after my elderly relative with compassion, cheerfulness, and expertise.  She has tremendous knowledge and experience.  We were blessed and thankful to find her.

description.displayText: I was very puzzled by Marilyn's behavior. She was hired to do a trial overnight and was going to come the day before go meet my mom and I - confirmed with me the day before. I wrote her same day to ask that she come at 1 instead of between 12-1pm and never heard from her. Very strange. I was going to give her the benefit of the doubt  but she never once reached out to either tell me she couldn't make it, wasn't interested anymore or running late. Total waste of time. I even checked one of her references who gave her a great review. I'm still a bit puzzled but this is not how you do business and extremely irresponsible behavior. I'm very disappointed.

description.displayText: Marilyn took care of my mother for only 7 months until mom passed away.  In that short time she became  a family member.  We were blessed to have had Marilyn take such good care of mom.  She is an amazing caregiver and you would be lucky to have her take care of a dear one in your family.  I recommend her highly.

We were blessed to have had Marilyn take such good care of mom.  She is an amazing caregiver and you would be lucky to have her take care of a dear one in your family.  I recommend her highly.

description.displayText: Marilyn cared for my Dad while he was in the hospital and at home. She never left his side and managed all his needs while respecting his dignity. She has an extensive knowledge of medications and procedures and maintained impeccable records for the doctor.  I highly recommend her for anyone needing help with a loved one.
description.originalText: Marilyn cared for my Dad while he was in the hospital and at home. She never left his side and managed all his needs while respecting his dignity. She has an extensive knowledge of medications and procedures and maintained impeccable records for the doctor.  I highly recommend her for anyone needing help with a loved one.

description.displayText:
Marilyn is a kind, considerate professional. From my experience, she comes into your home a stranger...but leaves a "family member."  From the beginning Marilyn learns all her client's needs and is non-stop active to keep them happy. She stays flexible. She keeps other family members up-to-speed on the client's condition as often as needed.

Marilyn speaks in a soft tone, with a smile on her face and this puts all at ease. She is an excellent listener.  I think many times clients are thrilled to just have that listening ear. The house is always clean and safe. She goes out of her way to keep her client comfortable at all times.. She is very pro-active in suggesting and serving healthy meals. She enjoys getting her client outside whenever possible. Marilyn is just the BEST. Can't say enough good things about Marilyn.

description.displayText:
I contacted Care.com when my sisters and I realized our father, who had undergone major heart surgery in addition to having complications from CHF, preferred to stay in his home, rather than move to a facility. We were looking for a live in to provide the support to make this possible. I can comfortably say, with Marilyn, our prayers were answered ten fold!
Marilyn came into my dad's life in April. She monitored his condition and took care of him 24 hrs a day, 7 days a week. Due to the CHF, he needed to be hospitalized numerous times to drain the plural effusion. Marilyn never left his side during the hospital stays. He eventually came home with a permanent drain which she tended to daily. Her patience, compassion, medical knowledge (she kept precise records of all tests, surgeries, doctors medications etc) and communication skills were extraordinary. My father passed recently, but was blessed with loving care by someone who we all now consider family. Marilyn is one in a million!

description.displayText: Marilyn takes care of your family member with her whole heart. She has a passion for caring for others. She is also very knowledgeable with medications and symptoms. She keeps you informed of what is happening with your loved one via text and pictures throughout the day. She keeps the atmosphere in the house very pleasant and light.  She engages the patient in conversation.
